ModMetaData.name: Simple Shelter (from CP Srv Add)
ModMetaData.author: CoproPanda
ModMetaData.description:
Simple shelter door and walls for temporary survival structures.
Taken from CuproPanda's Survivalist's Additions, re-balanced, and packaged as a stand-alone mod.
The shelter structures now have a beauty penalty as a tradeoff for being quick and easy to construct. They are also slightly flimsier than before.
Backwards-compatibile with games saved with the full mod. If you only used the shelter wall and door, just uninstall Survivalist's Additions, install this mod, and you no longer have a dependency on all the other pieces.
-----
CREDITS: Taken from CuproPanda's final, abandoned version of Survivalist's Additions: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1207562628 And based on mantrasong's 1.0 update: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1550854139
